1. Receive the vaccine
In our example, we are talking about influence. The most important thing is receiving the vaccine. You never know when the influence occurs but you can prevent and decrease the chance of suffer. Healthcare managers must be require the people who are the highest risks infect the influenza receive the vaccine. Such as healthcare worker, they always have a contact with the patient. Although the vaccine cannot 100% prevent the healthcare worker. But it can help them prevent a few type of influence. Also it is less side effects and safety. Sometimes, the healthcare worker will be lazy. They will think “I have received many vaccine. I think I have enough protection to protect myself and didn’t go to receive the vaccine.” It will make them miss the vaccine and decrease their body protection of influence.
Healthcare managers need to require them regularly to accept the vaccine.

2. Healthcare worker education.
It also is the important thing we need to do. If the healthcare managers can provide a good education to protect the healthcare worker. It can prevent many things. For example, the hospital is a have a lot of bacteria. Sometimes the bacteria will be combine and variant, become a new type influence. What can healthcare managers do? They can require the worker wear the facemask. What is facemask? Facemask is a disposable masks that cover our nose and mouth. It can prevent bacteria spread. The common spread way is saliva and snivel. Wearing the facemask can keep splashes or sprays from reaching the mouth and nose of the person.
Also, the internet has many forum. There will be many rumor to effect healthcare worker awareness such as our case. There are some rumor said boil the vinegar and drink radish roots can be prevent the SARS. Is that real and effective? Healthcare manager must be stop the rumor and suggest the right way to prevent the influenza.

3. Improve the medical system.
The medical system isn’t enough. Infectious disease is a rapidly spreading disease. Hong Kong Government must improve the health care system to cope with the rapidly spreading infectious diseases and protect our healthcare worker.
Healthcare managers need to improve and update their facilities. For example, when the SARS occur, we haven’t have a building that is for cope with infectious diseases. We just use the Amoy Gardens to isolation the patient. There weren’t professional facilities our healthcare worker. It is increasing the difficulty to handle the influence. Build up more professional building/facilities. If we have a professional facilities to support our healthcare worker and isolation the patient, it can mitigate an incidents effects.
